TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WorkflowTrackPoint extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Defines a point associated with a set of workflow status events that are tracked in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
Whenever the status of the workflow instance changes, the workflow instance emits a workflow status event based on one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values to the runtime tracking infrastructure. A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> defines an interest in all the points during the execution of a workflow instance at which specific types of workflow status events occur. You can add a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.WorkflowTrackPoints%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to instruct the runtime tracking infrastructure to send a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> to the tracking service when a specified set of workflow status events occur. A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> may be matched at multiple points in the workflow instance.
Set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A> with an appropriately configured <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> to specify the types of workflow status events that the runtime tracking infrastructure uses to match the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>. You can add to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> to specify additional information associated with the track point that should be sent by the runtime tracking infrastructure when the track point is matched.
This class cannot be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> is initialized with no annotations and no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A>. You must set a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A> for the track point.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Annotations As TrackingAnnotationCollection

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of annotations associated with the track point.
Docs.value: An that contains the annotations associated with the track point. The default is an empty collection; it specifies that no annotations are to be associated with the track point.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can add to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> to specify annotations to be returned in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> sent to the tracking service when the track point is matched.
Annotations are strings that you define that contain information to associate with the track point. For example, an annotation could contain information about the possible execution path the workflow can take from this track point, or it could contain information to be displayed in a user interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Workflow::Runtime::Tracking::WorkflowTrackingLocation ^ MatchingLocation { System::Workflow::Runtime::Tracking::WorkflowTrackingLocation ^ get(); void set(System::Workflow::Runtime::Tracking::WorkflowTrackingLocation ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the that specifies the workflow status events that should be matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure for the track point.
Docs.value: A that specified the workflow status events that should be matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure for the track point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks You must set a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A> for the track point. The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A> specifies one or more <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values that are used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to match the track point.
